rulesStrings.li: tale_noun->[PAWN_nameDef] being born in a cloning vat
image->[PAWN_nameFull] rise out of the cloning vat [circumstance_group]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] is artifically born out of the cloning vat [circumstance_group]
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] seems totally unaware of what is around [PAWN_objective].
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is incredibly confused of life outside the cloning vat.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] want back into the safety of the cloning vat.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] can barely figure out what is going on.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] make a few jumbled words of speech.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches with awe of what's going on.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches on with a look of fear.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches on with a look of lust.
